description: Frantically searching the forest, Jason Ridge (in a non-sexual role) comes across two nasty rednecks - Jake Dakota and Steve Trevor - brutally fucking each other inside a small hut. He begs for their help, but instead they seize him, throwing him inside a nasty shack where he's finally reunited with Tim Towers (in a non-sexual role). The two finally have an idea what's in store for them: They are going to be initiated into a bizarre sex Ritual.
title: Ritual, Scene #02
